name: Wilderness Navigation 3rd Edition
description: Conquer your bad sense of direction and learn to navigate safely through the backcountry. Find out about route finding, compasses, maps and more from this classic guide. Along with traditional mapping and navigation methods, it has a section on GPS technology for modern explorers. Also includes updated declination maps and info on interfacing GPS receivers with your computer, maximizing battery life, and using GPS functions on smartphones.
